item.description:
It will be good weather on Sunday, join us for our first tennis event this year. All levels are welcome. We will hit around and maybe play some games if so desired. Please indicate your level in your RSVP. Hope you can make it.

The tennis courts are in the back of the mall - bear right of the mall to get to Arsenal Park.

If you need a ride, please indicate the town and/or T stop you are coming from. Our members may be able to give you a ride.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Tennis
